title: Skipping — Coordination & Warm-up
goal: Raise heart rate, improve timing, prepare ankles/calves safely.
steps: Set-up (30s): Stand tall, elbows close to ribs, hands slightly forward of hips.
Practice turns (30s): Turn wrists only, shoulders relaxed.
Cooldown (60s): Walk slowly, shake out calves/ankles.
cues: Small jumps only (1–2 cm). Land softly.
Wrists turn the rope, not the arms.
If you trip repeatedly, slow down and rebuild timing.
safety: Stop if you feel sharp pain (ankle/knee/shin). Do not push through pain.
Train on a safe surface (not slippery). Remove hazards from the area.
Under-18s: train with appropriate supervision; ask a coach if unsure.

title: Shadowboxing — Technique & Footwork
goal: Clean technique, balance, and breathing — no rushing.
steps: Stance check (60s): Feet shoulder width, knees soft, hands up, chin tucked.
Round 2 (2m): Jab only + footwork (jab, step out, reset). Rest 1m.
Round 3 (2m): Jab–cross (1–2). Reset guard after each combo. Rest 1m.
Round 4 (2m): Add defence: slip after 1–2 (small movement). Rest 1m.
Finish (60s): Slow movement and breathing. Calm exit.
cues: Quality over speed. Every punch returns to guard.
Turn the hips on the cross. Do not overreach.
safety: Clear space: no furniture near elbows/hands.
Stop if dizzy or unwell; sit and inform an adult/coach.
Do not attempt advanced moves unsupervised.

title: Mobility — Ankles, Hips, Shoulders
goal: Improve movement quality and reduce injury risk.
steps: Ankle circles: 10 each direction per foot.
Calf raise (slow): 2 sets of 10 reps (hold 1s at top).
Bodyweight squat: 2 sets of 8 reps (chest up, knees track toes).
Scap push-ups: 2 sets of 8 reps (small range).
safety: No pain. Mild stretch is fine; sharp pain is not.
If you have an injury, follow coach/medical guidance first.

title: Core Stability — Foundation
goal: Build trunk stability to support balance, punching and injury prevention.
steps: Dead bug: 2 x 6 slow reps per side.
Standing brace: 3 x 5 breaths (hands on ribs, brace gently).
cues: Quality first — stop if form breaks.
Breathe normally, do not hold breath.
safety: No pain in lower back or neck.
Stop if shaking excessively or losing form.
Under-18s should avoid weighted core work.

title: Conditioning — Boxing Intervals (Beginner)
goal: Develop aerobic fitness and basic boxing conditioning safely.
steps: Cool-down: 2 minutes slow walk and breathing.
cues: Stay relaxed; this is not a sprint.
Hands return to guard after every punch.
Breathe through the nose if possible.
safety: Stop immediately if dizzy or nauseous.
Do not push intensity beyond control.

title: Footwork — Balance & Movement
goal: Improve balance, stance control and efficient movement.
steps: Left/right step: 2 x 10 reps each direction.
cues: Feet move first, hands stay up.
